description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Play chess as you've never played it before! With six sides to each tile, more pieces and larger boards of up to 91 tiles, the game is more complex than a square, 64 piece board. Play against your friends on the same XBox with one or two controllers, or play against three different AI difficulties. Three different versions of board and gameplay available!
